response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This unique offering is designed to revolutionize your operations and streamline your processes. Given its exceptional capabilities and the time, effort, and resources we've invested into its development, I believe it's worth more than just a glance. Considering its value, I am offering it to you for $20,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential return on investment you could see with this product. I understand that you might need some time to evaluate its worth to your specific needs, so please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 20000}
